definition: to avoid/to shun/to flee/to escape/to keep away from/to leave/to hide from

sentences.english: The method correctly determines the protective range of the arresters without circle lightning harm.
sentences.chinese: 該方法確定的避雷針保護範圍明確，無繞擊雷害。

sentences.english: This can be a lightening rod for sacroiliac pain.
sentences.chinese: 它是骶髂疼痛的避雷針。

sentences.english: Come up the stairs, and let on it's a lightning-rod.
sentences.chinese: 走樓梯上來嘛，‘只當是’爬避雷針上來的。

definition: to be an eyesore/(fig.) to spoil the fun/to be a wet blanket
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: to open fire/to shoot a gun
to feel guilty as a thief (idiom); to have sth on one's conscience
to make do in difficult circumstances by being resourceful/(of circumstances) difficult/challenging/(of a budget) tight/(of a man-made thing) makeshift/rough and ready
lit. firing after the horse/fig. belated action/giving advice in hindsight
